files.patch:
@@ -0,0 +1,74 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<android.support.constraint.ConstraintLayout
+    xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
+    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
+    android:layout_width="match_parent"
+    android:layout_height="match_parent"
+    tools:context="edu.hzuapps.androidlabs.homeworks.net1414080903120.ui.ChatActivity"
+    tools:layout_editor_absoluteY="81dp"
+    tools:layout_editor_absoluteX="0dp">
+
+
+    <TextView
+        android:id="@+id/textView2"
+        android:layout_width="0dp"
+        android:layout_height="60dp"
+        android:background="@drawable/tabbar_bg_nor"
+        android:gravity="center"
+        android:text="群名称"
+        android:textSize="20sp"
+        app:layout_constraintLeft_toLeftOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintRight_toRightOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent"/>
+
+    <ListView
+        android:layout_width="367dp"
+        android:layout_height="380dp"
+        android:layout_marginTop="8dp"
+        app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/textView2"
+        android:id="@+id/listView"
+        android:layout_marginLeft="8dp"
+        app:layout_constraintLeft_toLeftOf="parent"
+        android:layout_marginRight="8dp"
+        app:layout_constraintRight_toRightOf="parent"/>
+
+    <EditText
+        android:id="@+id/message_et"
+        android:layout_width="251dp"
+        android:layout_height="47dp"
+        android:ems="10"
+        android:inputType="textMultiLine"
+        app:layout_constraintRight_toLeftOf="@+id/guideline2"
+        android:layout_marginRight="8dp"
+        android:layout_marginLeft="0dp"
+        app:layout_constraintLeft_toLeftOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintHorizontal_bias="0.509"
+        app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent"
+        android:layout_marginBottom="8dp"
+        android:layout_marginTop="8dp"
+        app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/listView"
+        tools:layout_editor_absoluteY="455dp"/>
+
+    <android.support.constraint.Guideline
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:id="@+id/guideline2"
+        app:layout_constraintGuide_begin="278dp"
+        android:orientation="vertical"
+        tools:layout_editor_absoluteY="0dp"
+        tools:layout_editor_absoluteX="278dp"/>
+
+    <Button
+        android:id="@+id/send_btn"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:text="发送"
+        android:layout_marginTop="8dp"
+        app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/listView"
+        app:layout_constraintLeft_toRightOf="@+id/message_et"
+        android:layout_marginLeft="8dp"
+        android:layout_marginRight="8dp"
+        app:layout_constraintRight_toRightOf="parent"/>
+
+</android.support.constraint.ConstraintLayout>

@@ -0,0 +1,96 @@
+<RelativeLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+                xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
+                android:layout_width="match_parent"
+                android:layout_height="match_parent"
+                android:background="@color/colorBlueBackGround">
+    <LinearLayout
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_marginTop="50dp"
+        android:orientation="horizontal"
+        android:gravity="center">
+        <TextView
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:textSize="24sp"
+            android:text="创建群"/>
+    </LinearLayout>
+    <LinearLayout
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_marginTop="120dp"
+        android:layout_marginLeft="50dp"
+        android:layout_marginRight="50dp"
+        android:orientation="vertical" >
+        <LinearLayout
+            android:layout_width="match_parent"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:orientation="horizontal" >
+            <TextView
+                android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+                android:textSize="16sp"
+                android:text="群名称：" />
+
+            <EditText
+                android:layout_marginLeft="32dp"
+                android:id="@+id/createGroup_groupName"
+                android:layout_width="200dp"
+                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+                android:background="@color/common_plus_signin_btn_text_dark_default"
+                android:hint="8个字以内"
+                android:maxLength="10"
+                android:textSize="16sp"/>
+        </LinearLayout>
+        <LinearLayout
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_marginTop="20dp"
+            android:orientation="horizontal" >
+            <TextView
+                android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+                android:textSize="16sp"
+                android:text="群简介：" />
+            <EditText
+                android:layout_marginLeft="32dp"
+                android:id="@+id/createGroup_groupInfo"
+                android:layout_width="200dp"
+                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+                android:textSize="16sp"
+                android:minLines="5"
+                android:maxLines="8"
+                android:hint="255个字以内"
+                android:background="@color/common_plus_signin_btn_text_dark_default"
+                />
+        </LinearLayout>
+        <LinearLayout
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_marginTop="20dp"
+            android:layout_gravity="center"
+            android:orientation="horizontal" >
+            <Button
+                android:id="@+id/createGroup_btn_create"
+                android:layout_width="220dip"
+                android:layout_height="35dip"
+                android:gravity="center"
+                android:text="创建" />
+        </LinearLayout>
+        <LinearLayout
+            android:layout_width="match_parent"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_marginTop="20dp"
+            android:layout_gravity="center"
+            android:orientation="horizontal" >
+
+            <TextView
+                android:id="@+id/createGroup_warning"
+                android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+                android:textColor="@color/colorWarning"
+                android:textSize="16sp"
+                />
+        </LinearLayout>
+    </LinearLayout>
+</RelativeLayout>
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -0,0 +1,25 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<RelativeLayout
+    xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
+    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
+    android:layout_width="match_parent"
+    android:layout_height="match_parent"
+    tools:context="edu.hzuapps.androidlabs.homeworks.net1414080903120.ui.GroupListActivity">
+    <TextView
+        android:id="@+id/textview"
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:gravity="center"
+        android:textSize="40sp"
+        android:fontFamily="宋体"
+        android:textColor="@android:color/white"
+        android:background="@drawable/tabbar_bg_nor"
+        android:text="我的群组"/>
+
+    <ListView
+        android:id="@+id/group_listView"
+        android:layout_below="@id/textview"
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="match_parent"></ListView>
+</RelativeLayout>

@@ -0,0 +1,35 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<android.support.constraint.ConstraintLayout
+    xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
+    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
+    android:layout_width="match_parent"
+    android:layout_height="match_parent"
+    tools:context="edu.hzuapps.androidlabs.homeworks.net1414080903120.ui.JoinGroupActivity">
+
+    <TextView
+        android:id="@+id/textview"
+        android:layout_width="368dp"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:gravity="center"
+        android:textSize="40sp"
+        android:fontFamily="宋体"
+        android:textColor="@android:color/white"
+        android:background="@drawable/tabbar_bg_nor"
+        android:text="加群"/>
+
+    <ListView
+        android:id="@+id/join_group_lv"
+        android:layout_width="368dp"
+        android:layout_height="447dp"
+        android:layout_marginTop="8dp"
+        app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/textview"
+        android:layout_marginRight="8dp"
+        app:layout_constraintRight_toRightOf="parent"
+        android:layout_marginLeft="8dp"
+        app:layout_constraintLeft_toLeftOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintHorizontal_bias="0.0"
+        android:layout_marginBottom="8dp"/>
+
+</android.support.constraint.ConstraintLayout>

             android:orientation="horizontal" >
             <CheckBox
+                android:id="@+id/cb_remember"

@@ -0,0 +1,116 @@
+<RelativeLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+                xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
+                android:layout_width="match_parent"
+    android:layout_height="match_parent"
+    android:background="@color/colorBlueBackGround">
+    <LinearLayout
+            android:layout_width="match_parent"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_marginTop="50dp"
+            android:orientation="horizontal" 
+            android:gravity="center">
+            <TextView 
+                android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            	android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            	android:textSize="24sp"
+            	android:text="注册 "/>
+    </LinearLayout>
+    <LinearLayout
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_marginTop="120dp"
+        android:layout_marginLeft="50dp"
+        android:layout_marginRight="50dp"
+        android:orientation="vertical" >
+        <LinearLayout
+            android:layout_width="match_parent"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:orientation="horizontal" >
+            <TextView
+                android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+                android:textSize="16sp"
+                android:text="账号：" />
+
+            <EditText
+                android:layout_marginLeft="32dp"
+                android:id="@+id/register_account"
+                android:layout_width="200dp"
+                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+                android:background="@color/common_plus_signin_btn_text_dark_default"
+                android:hint="11位数字以内"
+                android:inputType="number"
+                android:maxLength="10"
+                android:textSize="16sp"/>
+        </LinearLayout>
+        <LinearLayout
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_marginTop="20dp"
+            android:orientation="horizontal" >
+            <TextView
+                android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+                android:textSize="16sp"
+                android:text="密码：" />
+            <EditText
+                android:layout_marginLeft="32dp"
+                android:id="@+id/register_password"
+                android:layout_width="200dp"
+                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+                android:textSize="16sp"
+                android:hint="8到16个字符"
+                android:inputType="textPassword"
+                android:background="@color/common_plus_signin_btn_text_dark_default"
+                />
+        </LinearLayout>
+        <LinearLayout
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_marginTop="20dp"
+            android:orientation="horizontal" >
+            <TextView
+                android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+                android:textSize="16sp"
+                android:text="确认密码：" />
+            <EditText
+                android:id="@+id/register_repassword"
+                android:layout_width="200dp"
+                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+                android:layout_marginLeft="0dp"
+                android:textSize="16sp"
+                android:inputType="textPassword"
+                android:hint="6到16个字符"
+                android:background="@color/common_plus_signin_btn_text_dark_default"/>
+        </LinearLayout>
+        <LinearLayout
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_marginTop="20dp"
+            android:layout_gravity="center"
+            android:orientation="horizontal" >
+            <Button
+                android:id="@+id/rigister_btn_register"
+                android:layout_width="220dip"
+                android:layout_height="35dip"
+                android:gravity="center"
+                android:text="注册" />
+        </LinearLayout>
+        <LinearLayout
+            android:layout_width="match_parent"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_marginTop="20dp"
+            android:layout_gravity="center"
+            android:orientation="horizontal" >
+
+            <TextView
+                android:id="@+id/register_warning"
+                android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+                android:textColor="@color/colorWarning"
+                android:textSize="16sp"
+                />
+        </LinearLayout>
+    </LinearLayout>
+</RelativeLayout>
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -0,0 +1,22 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+              android:layout_width="match_parent"
+              android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+              android:layout_marginLeft="20dp"
+              android:orientation="vertical">
+
+    <TextView
+        android:id="@+id/item_groupName"
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:text="群名称"
+        android:textSize="25sp"/>
+
+    <TextView
+        android:id="@+id/item_groupInfo"
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:maxLines="1"
+        android:text="群描述"
+        android:textSize="20sp"/>
+</LinearLayout>

@@ -0,0 +1,38 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<android.support.constraint.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+                                             xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
+                                             xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
+                                             android:layout_width="match_parent"
+              android:layout_height="match_parent">
+
+    <TextView
+        android:id="@+id/group_name_TextView"
+        android:layout_width="259dp"
+        android:layout_height="29dp"
+        android:layout_marginLeft="8dp"
+        android:layout_marginTop="8dp"
+        android:text="群名"
+        app:layout_constraintLeft_toLeftOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent"/>
+
+    <TextView
+        android:id="@+id/group_info_TextView"
+        android:layout_width="259dp"
+        android:layout_height="19dp"
+        android:layout_marginLeft="8dp"
+        android:layout_marginTop="0dp"
+        android:text="群简介"
+        app:layout_constraintLeft_toLeftOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/group_name_TextView"/>
+
+    <Button
+        android:id="@+id/add_btn"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_marginRight="8dp"
+        android:layout_marginTop="8dp"
+        android:text="加群"
+        app:layout_constraintRight_toRightOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent"/>
+
+</android.support.constraint.ConstraintLayout>

@@ -0,0 +1,23 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<RelativeLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+                xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
+                xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
+                android:layout_width="match_parent"
+                android:layout_height="match_parent"
+                android:layout_marginTop="5dp"
+                android:layout_marginBottom="5dp"
+                android:id="@+id/message_layout">
+
+    <TextView
+        android:layout_alignParentRight="false"
+        android:paddingLeft="10dp"
+        android:paddingTop="5dp"
+        android:paddingRight="5dp"
+        android:paddingEnd="10dp"
+        android:paddingBottom="10dp"
+        android:id="@+id/message_text"
+        android:layout_width="250dp"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:background="@drawable/chat_left"
+        android:text="TextVi1111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111ew"/>
+</RelativeLayout>

@@ -0,0 +1,23 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<RelativeLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+                xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
+                xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
+                android:layout_width="match_parent"
+                android:layout_height="match_parent"
+                android:layout_marginTop="5dp"
+                android:layout_marginBottom="5dp"
+                android:id="@+id/message_layout">
+
+        <TextView
+            android:layout_alignParentRight="true"
+            android:paddingLeft="10dp"
+            android:paddingTop="5dp"
+            android:paddingRight="5dp"
+            android:paddingEnd="10dp"
+            android:paddingBottom="10dp"
+            android:id="@+id/message_text"
+            android:layout_width="250dp"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:background="@drawable/chat_right"
+            android:text="TextVi1111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111ew"/>
+</RelativeLayout>
